EmailTemplate.name: Binary Email
EmailTemplate.subject: How can MBO help you?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
For over 25 years, MBO Partners has made it easier for independent consultants and their clients to work together by providing a suite of services for both independent consultants and the organizations that engage them.
If you are an independent consultant, contractor, or small firm, learn more here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>.
If you are a hiring manager or procurement professional, learn more here <http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help>. ___________________________________ MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 e: communications@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
